original_title: デリシャスボディガール・美咲　妖艶未亡人と愛欲たっぷりハンバーグ
overview: Kenichi dies in an accident just as he is about to be offered a position at a prestigious Western-style restaurant. In order to carry on Kenichi's legacy, his wife Misaki tries to learn the recipe for the "ultimate braised hamburger steak" that Kenichi pursued until the end. Misaki is surrounded by men who are attracted to her passion and beauty...
title: Delicious Body Girl Misaki
